org.jboss.windup.config.selectors

Interface FramesSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamedFramesSelector, TopLayerSingletonFramesSelector, TypedFramesSelector, TypedNamedFramesSelector

    public interface FramesSelector
    Retrieves proper Iterable of frames, from the variable stack.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III
